title: Bluesky’s Custom Algorithms Could Be the Future of Social Media
description: The option to choose the algorithms that power your feed is taking off on Bluesky—and there’s a good chance it will catch on elsewhere too.

title: How AI Protects (and Attacks) Your Inbox
description: Criminals may use artificial intelligence to scam you. Companies, like Google, are looking for ways AI and machine learning can help prevent phishing.
